channel.title: Dds-speced client help
channel.description:
hey, im having problems with a dds-speced client. it will let me conect but it wont let anyone else. i know the problem is client sided as they can conect on other clients... but ive changed the IP and i might of changed the port, i cant seem to find it... can someone help me please?
thanks.
